item.title: 万达地产称延长6亿美元债券偿还期限已提前获得持有人同意
item.description:
Chinese real estate firm Wanda Properties International [RIC:RIC:WPIC.UL], a unit of conglomerate Dalian Wanda Group, said on Thursday it had received early consent approval from bondholders to extend the repayment on a $600 million guaranteed bond due 2024.翻译:大连万达集团旗下中国房地产公司万达地产国际[RIC:RIC:WPIC.UL]周四表示，已获得债券持有人的提前同意，延长2024年到期的6亿美元担保债券的偿还期限。

The regulatory filing in Hong Kong said those voting in favour of the extension represented more than 99.3% of the aggregate principal amount of the bonds.翻译:香港的监管文件称，投票赞成延期的人占债券本金总额的99.3%以上。

Wanda Properties is still seeking final approval to extend the payment date of its $600 million 7.25% note to Dec. 29, 2024 from the current maturity date of Jan. 29, at a meeting of bondholders on Dec. 13 this year.翻译:万达地产仍在寻求最终批准，以在今年 12 月 13 日的债券持有人会议上将其 6 亿美元、年息 7.25% 票据的付款日期从目前的 1 月 29 日到期日延长至 2024 年 12 月 29 日。

Reporting by Liz Lee and Beijing newsroom; Editing by Jamie Freed翻译:Liz Lee和北京新闻编辑室的报道；杰米·弗里德编辑

item.title: 台湾总统：中国“不知所措”，无法考虑入侵
item.description:
China's leadership is too "overwhelmed" with its internal problems to consider an invasion of Taiwan, President Tsai Ing-wen said in an interview with the New York Times.翻译:蔡英文总统在接受《纽约时报》采访时表示，中国领导层对其内部问题“不堪重负”，不会考虑入侵台湾。

China, which views democratically governed Taiwan as its own territory, has ramped up military pressure against the island over the past four years, leading to concerns of a conflict that would have global repercussions.翻译:中国将民主治理的台湾视为自己的领土，过去四年加大了对该岛的军事压力，引发了人们对冲突可能产生全球影响的担忧。

But Tsai, in a transcript of the interview her office published on Thursday, said China had too many issues at the moment.翻译:但蔡英文在其办公室周四发布的采访记录中表示，中国目前存在太多问题。

"Well, I think the Chinese leadership at this juncture is overwhelmed by its internal challenges. And my thought is that perhaps this is not a time for them to consider a major invasion of Taiwan," she said.翻译:“嗯，我认为中国领导层在这个时刻被其内部挑战压垮了。我的想法是，也许现在不是他们考虑大规模入侵台湾的时候，”她说。

"Largely because the internal economic and financial as well as political challenges, but also, the international community has made it loud and clear that war is not an option, and peace and stability serves everybody's interests."翻译:“很大程度上是因为国内经济、金融以及政治挑战，而且国际社会已经明确表示，战争不是一种选择，和平与稳定符合每个人的利益。”

Tsai and her government have repeatedly called for talks with China but been rebuffed, as Beijing views Tsai and the ruling Democratic Progressive Party as separatists.翻译:蔡英文及其政府多次呼吁与中国进行谈判，但遭到拒绝，因为北京将蔡英文和执政的民进党视为分裂分子。

Tsai says only Taiwan's people can decide their future.翻译:蔡英文表示，只有台湾人民才能决定自己的未来。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:本·布兰查德报道；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 中国习近平访问金融中心上海
item.description:
China President Xi Jinping visited Shanghai, where he went to several venues and learned about the city's efforts to strengthen its competitiveness as an international financial centre, Xinhua news agency reported on Wednesday.翻译:据新华社周三报道，中国国家主席习近平访问上海，参观了上海多个场馆，了解上海为增强国际金融中心竞争力所做的努力。

Xi made the trip on Tuesday and Wednesday and he inspected the Shanghai Futures Exchange, an exhibition on Shanghai's sci-tech innovations and a government-subsidized rental housing community, the report said.翻译:报道称，习近平周二和周三出访，考察了上海期货交易所、上海科技创新展览和政府补贴租赁住房社区。

He was seen with other government leaders, including Cai Qi, the head of the powerful Secretariat of the Communist Party of China Central Committee that oversees day-to-day affairs of the CPC.翻译:人们看到他与其他政府领导人在一起，其中包括负责中共日常事务的中共中央书记处书记蔡奇。

Vice Premier He Lifeng, Shanghai's Communist party secretary Chen Jining and Mayor Gong Zheng also accompanied his visit.翻译:国务院副总理何立峰、上海市委书记陈吉宁、市长龚正陪同考察。

A video posted by state television showed Xi inspecting a humanoid robot and a section of an exhibition showcasing China's integrated circuits technology, an industry that he has been pushing for more modernisation and self-sufficiency.翻译:国家电视台发布的一段视频显示，习近平正在检查一个人形机器人，以及展示中国集成电路技术的展览的一部分，他一直在推动这个行业更加现代化和自给自足。

He could also be seen touring an affordable housing compound in Shanghai's Minhang district. The Chinese government has in recent months pledged more support in boosting affordable housing as high home prices in major cities like Shanghai shut out many buyers.翻译:人们还看到他参观了上海闵行区的一个经济适用房小区。由于上海等主要城市的高房价将许多购房者拒之门外，中国政府近几个月承诺加大经济适用房支持力度。

It was his first visit to the city since November 2020 and comes a year after historic street protests against China's zero-COVID policy broke out in Shanghai.翻译:这是他自 2020 年 11 月以来首次访问这座城市，一年前，上海爆发了针对中国零新冠政策的历史性街头抗议活动。

The visit also coincides with the 10th anniversary of the establishment of the Shanghai Free-Trade Zone (FTZ), a testing ground for economic reforms that has struggled to live up to its initial promise of free-flowing currency and easier international trade.翻译:此次访问也恰逢上海自由贸易区（FTZ）成立十周年。上海自由贸易区是经济改革的试验场，一直在努力兑现其最初承诺的货币自由流动和国际贸易便利化的承诺。

Shanghai is home to China's largest foreign business community, hosting firms such as Tesla (TSLA.O), Disney (DIS.N) and L'Oreal, but its economy and global reputation was badly hit by a two-month-long COVID-induced lockdown last year.翻译:上海是中国最大的外国商业社区的所在地，拥有特斯拉(TSLA.O) 、迪士尼(DIS.N)和欧莱雅等公司，但其经济和全球声誉受到了长达两个月的新冠疫情的严重打击。去年引发的封锁。

Xi's visit also comes as confidence among foreign businesses and private investors in the Chinese economy remains subdued, hurt by the country's past COVID policies and a years-long regulatory crackdown on sectors from technology to property that the government began easing this year.翻译:习近平此次访问之际，外国企业和私人投资者对中国经济的信心仍然低迷，原因是中国过去的新冠疫情政策以及政府今年开始放松的对技术和房地产等行业长达数年的监管打压。

Overtures by Chinese Premier Li Qiang, a close Xi confidant, to both foreign firms and local entrepreneurs over the past year where he has declared the country open for business has been greeted with scepticism in light of a broader anti-espionage law, and moves such as raids on consultancies, as well as a lack of policies to boost confidence.翻译:过去一年里，习近平的亲密密友、中国总理李强向外国公司和当地企业家提出的建议，他宣布中国开放商业，但鉴于更广泛的反间谍法，他受到了质疑，并采取了诸如此类的举措。对咨询机构的突击搜查，以及缺乏提振信心的政策。

item.title: First Quantum 首席财务官表示为巴拿马项目引入合作伙伴还为时过早
item.description:
A top official of Canadian miner First Quantum Minerals (FM.TO) said on Wednesday it is too early and likely too challenging to consider bringing a new partner into its flagship Panama project due to the situation in the country.翻译:加拿大矿业公司第一量子矿业(FM.TO)的一位高级官员周三表示，鉴于该国的情况，考虑在其旗舰巴拿马项目中引入新合作伙伴还为时过早，而且可能太具有挑战性。

The future of First Quantum's Cobre Panama mine, which accounts for about 1% of global copper output, has become uncertain after Panama president Laurentino Cortizo on Tuesday ordered the closure of the mine. This followed the top court's decision to declare First Quantum's contract unconstitutional.翻译:第一量子旗下的 Cobre 巴拿马矿约占全球铜产量的 1%，在巴拿马总统劳伦蒂诺·科尔蒂索周二下令关闭该矿后，该矿的未来变得不确定。在此之前，最高法院决定宣布第一量子的合同违宪。

Bringing a new investor who could help diversify the risk and fortify First Quantum's balance sheet has been suggested as a likely solution.翻译:有人建议引入一位新投资者，帮助分散风险并强化第一量子的资产负债表，作为一种可能的解决方案。

The comments were made by First Quantum Minerals CFO Ryan MacWilliam at an annual mining conference organized by Scotiabank, according to a note prepared by the Canadian bank seen by Reuters.翻译:根据路透社看到的加拿大丰业银行准备的一份报告，第一量子矿业首席财务官 Ryan MacWilliam 在丰业银行组织的年度采矿会议上发表了上述言论。

When asked for comments, First Quantum referred to the Scotiabank note. Scotiabank was not available for an immediate comment.翻译:当被问及评论时，第一量子提到了丰业银行的票据。丰业银行未能立即置评。

The comments are the first by the company on the future of the Cobre Panama mine's ownership since Tuesday's court ruling.翻译:这是自周二法院裁决以来，该公司首次就巴拿马铜矿所有权的未来发表评论。

Panama has seen unprecedented public protests after the government signed a new contract with First Quantum for its Cobre Panama mine. The protesters choked supplies to the mine, forcing First Quantum to suspend the mine last week.翻译:巴拿马政府与第一量子公司为其巴拿马铜矿签署新合同后，引发了前所未有的公众抗议。抗议者切断了对该矿的供应，迫使第一量子公司上周暂停了该矿的开采。

MacWilliam told the conference that given the events in Panama, it remains unclear when Cobre Panama will be able to resume operations.翻译:麦克威廉在会议上表示，鉴于巴拿马发生的事件，目前尚不清楚 Cobre巴拿马何时能够恢复运营。

The Cobre Panama mine's workers staged protests in different parts of the country on Wednesday, seeking answers on the future of their job posts.翻译:周三，巴拿马科布雷矿的工人在全国各地举行抗议活动，寻求工作岗位未来的答案。

"We are carrying out peaceful protests in the name of our colleagues," the mine's union said in a social media post, while urging authorities to take into consideration labor rights when making decisions about the major copper mine.翻译:该矿工会在社交媒体上发帖称，“我们正在以同事的名义进行和平抗议”，同时敦促当局在对大型铜矿做出决定时考虑到劳工权利。

First Quantum supports more than 40,000 indirect and direct job posts in Panama.翻译:First Quantum 支持巴拿马超过 40,000 个间接和直接工作岗位。

Separately, the company said in a statement on Wednesday it was interested in pursuing dialogue with the Panama government, and warned of environmental damage if the mine were not shut in an orderly manner.翻译:另外，该公司周三在一份声明中表示，有兴趣与巴拿马政府进行对话，并警告称，如果不有序关闭该矿，将会对环境造成损害。

The protests have wiped out about C$11 billion ($8.1 billion) from First Quantum's market value. On Wednesday, the stock was down about 10%.翻译:抗议活动已导致 First Quantum 的市值蒸发约 110 亿加元（81 亿美元）。周三，该股下跌约10%。

China's Jiangxi Copper Co Ltd (600362.SS) is First Quantum's biggest shareholder.翻译:中国江西铜业股份有限公司（600362.SS）是第一量子的最大股东。

The mine closure also has consequences for the Central American nation, as Cobre Panama contributes about 5% to Panama's economy.翻译:矿场关闭也对这个中美洲国家产生了影响，因为巴拿马铜矿对巴拿马经济的贡献约为 5%。

First Quantum, which has spent over $10 billion to develop the mine, has launched two separate tracks of international arbitration to protect its assets, the CFO said, which accounted for about 46% of its third quarter earnings.翻译:该首席财务官表示，第一量子已斥资超过 100 亿美元开发该矿，并启动了两个独立的国际仲裁来保护其资产，该资产约占其第三季度收益的 46%。

($1 = 1.3594 Canadian dollars)翻译:（1 美元 = 1.3594 加元）

item.title: 早盘竞价：大量数据、政策日能否撼动市场？
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。

If this week has so far been strangely listless for Asian markets, that could be about to change suddenly on Thursday as investors brace for a deluge of top-tier economic data and policy events from across the continent.翻译:如果说本周亚洲市场迄今为止表现得异常无精打采，那么周四情况可能会突然发生变化，因为投资者正准备迎接来自整个非洲大陆的大量顶级经济数据和政策事件。

Among the highlights, South Korea's central bank sets interest rates, China releases its official manufacturing and service sector purchasing managers index reports for November, and India announces its third quarter growth figures.翻译:亮点包括韩国央行设定利率、 中国发布11 月份官方制造业和服务业采购经理人指数报告以及印度公布第三季度增长数据。

The latest industrial production and retail sales data from both Japan and South Korea are on tap too, all of which could move their respective markets, especially currencies.翻译:日本和韩国最新的工业生产和零售销售数据也正在发布，所有这些数据都可能影响各自的市场，尤其是货币。

All else equal, the risks for Asian markets on Thursday may be tilted to the upside, even though stock markets around the world again struggled on Wednesday.翻译:在其他条件相同的情况下，尽管周三全球股市再次陷入困境，但周四亚洲市场的风险可能会倾向于上行。

That's largely because the ongoing fall in the dollar and U.S. bond yields continues to loosen financial conditions. In theory, this should boost animal spirits and the allure of riskier, higher-yielding assets.翻译:这主要是因为美元和美国债券收益率的持续下跌导致金融状况持续宽松。从理论上讲，这应该会提振动物精神和风险较高、收益较高的资产的吸引力。

U.S. financial conditions are the loosest since early September and have eased 100 basis points in a month, according to Goldman Sachs. The bank's global and emerging market indexes ticked up a bit last week, but financial conditions are also looser by around 100 bps from a month ago.翻译:高盛(Goldman Sachs)表示，美国金融状况为9月初以来最宽松，一个月内下降了100个基点。该银行的全球和新兴市场指数上周小幅上涨，但金融状况也较一个月前宽松约 100 个基点。

U.S. rates futures markets are now pricing in more than 100 basis points of rate cuts next year starting in May, and the two-year Treasury yield is its lowest since July - it has slumped nearly 40 basis points this week alone.翻译:美国利率期货市场目前预计明年5月起降息幅度将超过100个基点，两年期国债收益率为7月以来的最低水平——仅本周就下跌了近40个基点。

The dollar on Wednesday hit its lowest since Aug. 10, and most Asian and regional currencies are taking advantage. Two of the best-performers are at the polar opposite ends of the 'carry' spectrum - the New Zealand dollar and Japanese yen.翻译:美元周三触及8月10日以来的最低点，大多数亚洲和地区货币都在趁机获利。表现最好的两种货币——新西兰元和日元——处于“利差”范围的两端。

The 'kiwi' dollar got an extra boost on Wednesday following the central bank's 'hawkish hold' - policymakers kept the key cash rate at a relatively high 5.50%, but unexpectedly signaled that it could be raised again if inflation doesn't moderate.翻译:在央行“鹰派立场”之后，新西兰元周三获得额外提振——政策制定者将关键现金利率维持在相对较高的 5.50%，但出人意料地表示，如果通胀不放缓，可能会再次上调利率。

Remarkably, Japanese interest rates are still negative, but maybe not for much longer. Expectations the Bank of Japan will soon end its negative rate policy has pulled the yen up from the depths, and in the process, eased pressure on the central bank to support the currency via direct FX market intervention.翻译:值得注意的是，日本的利率仍然为负，但可能不会持续太久。日本央行将很快结束负利率政策的预期将日元从深渊拉升，并在此过程中缓解了央行通过直接外汇市场干预来支持日元的压力。

South Korea's central bank is expected to keep its base rate on hold at 3.50% and leave it there until at least the middle of next year. But as the Reserve Bank of New Zealand showed on Wednesday, policymakers retain the ability to surprise.翻译:预计韩国央行将把基准利率维持在 3.50%，并至少维持到明年年中。但正如新西兰储备银行周三所表明的那样，政策制定者仍然有能力带来惊喜。

Indian GDP growth, meanwhile, is expected to have slowed to a 6.8% annual rate in the July-September period from 7.8%, while Chinese factor activity likely contracted again in November but at a slower pace.翻译:与此同时，印度 7 月至 9 月 GDP 增速预计将从 7.8% 放缓至 6.8%，而中国要素活动可能在 11 月再次收缩，但增速放缓。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Thursday:翻译:以下是周四可能为市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- South Korea interest rate decision翻译:- 韩国利率决定

- China official PMIs (November)翻译:- 中国官方采购经理人指数（11 月）

- India GDP (Q3)翻译:- 印度 GDP（第三季度）

item.title: 外交部长：中国聚集性流感病例已得到有效控制
item.description:
A recent increase in respiratory illnesses in China is a common issue faced by that all countries and Chinese authorities have it under effective control, China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Wednesday.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周三表示，近期中国呼吸道疾病增多是各国面临的共同问题，中国当局已有效控制疫情。

The World Health Organization (WHO) last week requested China provide detailed information on an increase in respiratory illnesses and reported clusters of pneumonia in children.翻译:世界卫生组织（WHO）上周要求中国提供有关呼吸道疾病增加和报告的儿童聚集性肺炎的详细信息。

But a WHO official said on Monday that the spike in illnesses in China is not as high as before the COVID-19 pandemic, and reiterated that no new or unusual pathogens had been found in the recent cases.翻译:但世卫组织一名官员周一表示，中国的病例激增程度没有 COVID-19 大流行之前那么高，并重申在最近的病例中没有发现新的或不寻常的病原体。

"Recently we have seen some clusters of flu cases among children in certain parts of China. In fact, that is a very common phenomenon in many countries, and in China that has been put under effective control," Wang told reporters at the United Nations in New York where he is chairing a U.N. Security Council session on the Israel-Hamas conflict.翻译:王毅在联合国对记者说：“最近我们看到中国一些地区出现了一些儿童聚集性流感病例。事实上，这种现象在很多国家都是很普遍的现象，在中国也已经得到了有效控制。”他正在纽约主持联合国安理会有关以色列与哈马斯冲突的会议。

"China's interactions with the international community will not be affected by any factors, and we welcome more visits from friends from across the world," he said.翻译:中国与国际社会的交往不会受到任何因素的影响，我们欢迎世界各国朋友更多地来访。

Both China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting on the earliest COVID-19 cases that emerged in the central Chinese city of Wuhan in late 2019.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织都面临着关于 2019 年底在中国中部城市武汉出现的最早的 COVID-19 病例报告透明度的质疑。

item.title: Shein IPO 引发有关供应链中涉嫌强迫劳动的新问题
item.description:
As China-founded e-commerce behemoth Shein moves to list in New York, U.S. lawmakers are again calling on it to prove that forced labor is not used to make its $5 t-shirts and $10 sweaters.翻译:随着中国创立的电子商务巨头 Shein 在纽约上市，美国立法者再次呼吁该公司证明其 5 美元的 T 恤和 10 美元的毛衣的生产过程中没有使用强迫劳动。

Shein confidentially filed for an initial public offering on Monday and could launch sales of its shares some time in 2024. The Singapore-based company has not determined the size of the deal or the valuation at IPO. Bloomberg earlier this month reported that it targeted up to $90 billion in the float.翻译:Shein 周一秘密申请首次公开募股，并可能在 2024 年某个时候出售其股票。这家总部位于新加坡的公司尚未确定交易规模或 IPO 估值。彭博社本月早些时候报道称，其发行目标为 900 亿美元。

Founded in 2012, Shein has been eyeing a U.S. IPO for at least three years but has been deterred by headwinds that included tensions between Beijing and Washington.翻译:Shein 成立于 2012 年，至少三年来一直考虑在美国首次公开募股，但因北京和华盛顿之间的紧张局势等不利因素而止步。

The online fast-fashion retailer, which manufactures most of its merchandise in China, faces criticism that Uyghur forced labor is used to make its low-priced apparel and home goods.翻译:这家在线快时尚零售商的大部分商品在中国生产，该公司面临着使用维吾尔族强迫劳动来生产其低价服装和家居用品的批评。

Critics are concerned that Shein may use contract manufacturers in China's Xinjiang region, where advocates and governments have accused China of interning Uyghurs and other largely Muslim minority groups. Beijing denies any abuses.翻译:批评者担心，谢因可能会使用中国新疆地区的合同制造商，那里的倡导者和政府指责中国拘禁维吾尔人和其他以穆斯林为主的少数民族群体。北京否认有任何侵权行为。

Convincing regulators that its supply chain is clean will likely be a major regulatory hurdle as Shein works to convince the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission that its shares should be traded publicly.翻译:让监管机构相信其供应链是干净的可能会成为主要的监管障碍，因为 Shein 正在努力说服美国证券交易委员会其股票应该公开交易。

“If the fast-fashion giant Shein wants to go public in the U.S., they should have to prove to American consumers that their products are not sourced from forced labor,” Democratic Representative Jennifer Wexton said in a statement on Tuesday.翻译:“如果快时尚巨头 Shein 想要在美国上市，他们应该向美国消费者证明他们的产品并非来自强迫劳动，”民主党众议员詹妮弗·韦克斯顿 (Jennifer Wexton) 在周二的一份声明中表示。

The congresswoman earlier this year led a bipartisan call for the SEC to halt Shein’s IPO until it verifies that the company does not use forced labor within its supply chain.翻译:今年早些时候，这位女议员领导两党呼吁美国证券交易委员会停止 Shein 的首次公开募股，直到核实该公司在其供应链中不使用强迫劳动。

A separate group of Republican attorneys general from 16 U.S. states has also asked the SEC to audit the company, and Shein has been investigated by two separate congressional committees over its sourcing and use of a trade loophole that allows most of its products to enter the United States duty free.翻译:来自美国 16 个州的共和党总检察长组成的独立小组也要求美国证券交易委员会对该公司进行审计，Shein 已受到两个独立的国会委员会的调查，原因是该公司的采购和利用了允许其大部分产品进入美国的贸易漏洞。 各国免税。

A spokesperson for Shein in a statement on Tuesday said the company has a zero-tolerance policy for forced labor and was "eager to engage and continue to be transparent with all stakeholders, including Representative Wexton and her staff."翻译:Shein 的发言人在周二的一份声明中表示，该公司对强迫劳动采取零容忍政策，并“渴望与所有利益相关者接触并继续保持透明，包括代表韦克斯顿及其员工。”

Shein has previously told Reuters it has no contract manufacturers in Xinjiang.翻译:Shein 此前曾告诉路透社，该公司在新疆没有合同制造商。

A spokesperson for the SEC said the agency does not comment on any individual entity’s filings.翻译:美国证券交易委员会发言人表示，该机构不会对任何个别实体的备案文件发表评论。

Megan Penick, a public securities lawyer at Michelman & Robinson, said it is unlikely to see a "direct block" from the SEC, but the agency could make the process difficult for Shein by making "the disclosure requirements so detailed, and, perhaps extreme, that it makes it seem ... trying to go public cannot be achieved."翻译:米歇尔曼·罗宾逊律师事务所 (Michelman & Robinson) 的公共证券律师梅根·佩尼克 (Megan Penick) 表示，不太可能看到 SEC 的“直接阻止”，但该机构可能会通过“披露要求如此详细，甚至可能是极端”，从而使 Shein 的流程变得困难。 ，这看起来……试图上市是不可能实现的。”

"There may be issues with the forced labor allegations and the IP (intellectual property) issues that may make it hard for (Shein) to be able to answer the questions to the satisfaction of the SEC," Penick said.

LOBBYING CAPITOL HILL

Public disclosures show that Shein has spent $1.28 million on Capitol Hill lobbying this year as it prepares to go public.翻译:公开披露的信息显示，Shein 今年在准备上市时已花费 128 万美元用于国会山游说。

The company has also met privately with lawmakers, including some of its biggest critics, in an effort to shift its reputation in Washington, according to several congressional aides.翻译:据几位国会助手称，该公司还与立法者私下会面，其中包括一些最大的批评者，以努力改变其在华盛顿的声誉。

One source familiar with the matter said that representatives for Shein emphasized the retailer’s efforts to diversify its supply chain from China to other countries, including India.翻译:一位知情人士表示，Shein 的代表强调了该零售商努力将其供应链从中国转向包括印度在内的其他国家。

Shein also touted its efforts to bring more China-made goods to the United States in bulk on traditional container ships, which requires paying tariffs on those items.翻译:Shein还宣传其努力通过传统集装箱船将更多中国制造的商品批量运往美国，这需要对这些商品缴纳关税。

“Shein is fundamentally a Chinese company and investors should approach Chinese offerings with extreme caution. Its attempt to go public should prompt a closer look at its business practices, especially its links to slave labor and its evasion of U.S. customs laws," Republican Sen. Marco Rubio told Reuters.翻译:“Shein 从根本上来说是一家中国公司，投资者应极其谨慎地对待中国产品。它的上市尝试应该促使人们更仔细地审视其商业行为，特别是其与奴役劳工的联系以及其逃避美国海关法的行为，”共和党参议员马可·卢比奥告诉路透社。

"I will closely monitor Shein's disclosures in the lead-up to its IPO,” added Rubio, who in June criticized the retailer’s lobbying efforts in a letter distributed to other senators.翻译:卢比奥补充道：“我将在 Shein 首次公开募股前夕密切关注 Shein 的披露情况。”6 月份，卢比奥在发给其他参议员的一封信中批评了该零售商的游说努力。

Republican Representative Chris Smith, chairman of the Congressional-Executive Commission on China, has also criticized Shein's lobbying efforts.翻译:国会及行政部门中国委员会主席、共和党众议员克里斯·史密斯也批评了谢因的游说努力。

“Any investor in this company should be wary of the material risks involved in Shein’s business model ... particularly as Congress is demanding an end to forced labor and closure of import subsidies for Chinese companies,” Smith said.

INCREASED SCRUTINY

In its most recent social impact report, Shein highlighted its partnership with Oritain, a company also used by the U.S. government to test cotton for links to China’s Xinjiang region.翻译:Shein 在其最新的社会影响报告中强调了其与 Oritain 的合作关系，该公司也被美国政府用来测试棉花与中国新疆地区的联系。

Oritain CEO Grant Cochrane on Tuesday that the testing company conducted 2,762 tests of Shein yarn, fabric and finished products between August 2022 and November 2023 and that 1.7% tested positive for cotton from unapproved regions. The average prevalence of cotton from unapproved regions among brands that work with Oritain was 6% in 2023, according to the company.翻译:Oritain首席执行官格兰特·科克伦(Grant Cochrane)周二表示，该测试公司在2022年8月至2023年11月期间对Shein纱线、织物和成品进行了2,762次测试，其中1.7%的棉花测试结果呈阳性，这些棉花来自未经批准的地区。据该公司称，到 2023 年，与 Oritain 合作的品牌中来自未经批准地区的棉花的平均流行率为 6%。

Critics, however, say that the testing does not adequately screen the millions of garments exported globally by Shein every year.翻译:然而批评者表示，测试并没有充分筛查 Shein 每年向全球出口的数百万件服装。

Penick said that the SEC's handling of Shein's IPO will be crucial for other e-commerce players including ByteDance's TikTok and PDD Group's Temu, which may consider going public in the U.S. in the future.翻译:佩尼克表示，SEC 对 Shein IPO 的处理对于字节跳动旗下 TikTok 和拼多多集团旗下 Temu 等其他电商企业至关重要，这些企业未来可能会考虑在美国上市。

Shein's IPO is "going to be raising issues (for the SEC) that may later be applied across the board to all China-based or China-related companies that are going public," Penick said.翻译:佩尼克表示，Shein 的首次公开募股“将（向美国证券交易委员会）提出问题，这些问题随后可能会全面适用于所有即将上市的中国或与中国相关的公司”。

Reporting by Katherine Masters and Arriana Mclymore; Additional reporting by Michael Martina; Editing by Marguerita Choy and Mark Porter翻译:凯瑟琳·马斯特斯和阿里安娜·麦克利莫尔的报道；迈克尔·玛蒂娜 (Michael Martina) 的补充报道；玛格丽塔·蔡和马克·波特编辑

item.title: 克里表示，中美将在 COP28 峰会上合作
item.description:
The United States will work with China to make the United Nations climate negotiations that begin in the United Arab Emirates this week a success, Washington's climate envoy said on Wednesday.翻译:华盛顿气候特使周三表示，美国将与中国合作，使本周在阿拉伯联合酋长国开始的联合国气候谈判取得成功。

Cooperation between the U.S. and China, the world's two biggest emitters of greenhouse gases, is seen as crucial to securing consensus at the Nov. 30 - Dec. 12 summit, known as COP28.翻译:美国和中国这两个世界上最大的温室气体排放国之间的合作被认为对于在 11 月 30 日至 12 月 12 日举行的 COP28 峰会上达成共识至关重要。

"We have decided to actually work together to get a successful COP, to get a successful global stocktake," Kerry said of his meeting with his Chinese counterpart this month.翻译:克里在谈到本月与中国外长的会面时表示：“我们决定切实合作，以召开一次成功的缔约方会议，并成功进行全球盘点。”

The global stocktake is an assessment taking place at the climate talks on how far off countries are from limiting global heating to 1.5 degrees Celsius above pre-industrial levels.翻译:全球盘点是在气候谈判中进行的一项评估，旨在评估各国距离将全球升温限制在工业化前水平以上 1.5 摄氏度以内还有多远。

Kerry and Chinese climate envoy Xie Zhenhua met in California where the sides agreed to the revival of a bilateral climate working group that Beijing had suspended last year.翻译:克里和中国气候特使解振华在加州会面，双方同意恢复北京去年暂停的双边气候工作组。

The U.S. and China agreed to back a new global renewables target and work together on methane and plastic pollution, though differences remain on fossil fuels, among other issues.翻译:美国和中国同意支持新的全球可再生能源目标，并就甲烷和塑料污染问题开展合作，尽管在化石燃料等问题上仍存在分歧。

"We intend to work hard to see if there's further collaboration that could advance the cause for all of us," Kerry said. "Without China and the United States aggressively moving forward to reduce emissions, we don't win this battle."翻译:克里说：“我们打算努力看看是否有进一步的合作可以推动我们所有人的事业。” “如果中国和美国不积极推进减排，我们就无法赢得这场战斗。”

The talks in the UAE, a major oil producer, are a critical opportunity for governments to accelerate action on climate change. However, they remain split over the use of fossil fuels, the burning of which is the main cause of climate change.翻译:在主要石油生产国阿联酋举行的会谈是各国政府加快应对气候变化行动的重要机会。然而，他们在化石燃料的使用问题上仍然存在分歧，化石燃料的燃烧是气候变化的主要原因。

Kerry, in a call with reporters, urged major producers of fossil fuels to support language that would commit them to phasing out the use of "unabated" fossil fuels - a reference to fuels burned without emissions-capturing technology.翻译:克里在与记者的通话中敦促主要化石燃料生产商支持承诺逐步淘汰使用“有增无减”化石燃料的措辞——指的是在没有排放捕获技术的情况下燃烧的燃料。

"They need to immediately step up and be part of the solution, not the most significant part of the problem," he said without identifying any particular producer.翻译:“他们需要立即挺身而出，成为解决方案的一部分，而不是成为问题最重要的部分，”他说，但没有透露具体的生产商。

In April the Group of Seven industrialised nations, which includes the United States, agreed to speed up the "phase-out of unabated fossil fuels" in what appeared to be a possible breakthrough over their use.翻译:今年四月，包括美国在内的七国集团同意加快“逐步淘汰化石燃料”，这似乎是化石燃料使用方面的一个可能的突破。

Negotiators have turned to new terminologies in search of a compromise after divisions over the future of fossil fuels failed to lead to a deal on a phase-down at last year's summit.翻译:去年峰会上，由于对化石燃料未来的分歧未能达成逐步削减协议，谈判代表们转向新术语寻求妥协。

"We hope we can send a very strong signal that the nations of the world are committed to work together to transition away from fossil fuel emissions in the next three decades. Period. It's critical," Kerry said.翻译:“我们希望我们能够发出一个非常强烈的信号，即世界各国致力于共同努力，在未来三十年内摆脱化石燃料排放。就这样。这很关键，”克里说。

Reporting by Alexander Cornwell Editing by Mark Potter and Gareth Jones翻译:亚历山大·康威尔 (Alexander Cornwell) 报道 马克·波特 (Mark Potter) 和加雷斯·琼斯 (Gareth Jones) 编辑
item.author: Alexander Cornwell

item.title: 一年过去了，中国的新冠抗议者陷入希望与冷漠之间
item.description:
One year after "white paper" protests flared across China against stringent COVID restrictions, Yicheng Huang fears this rare show of public dissent may eventually be forgotten by the Chinese public amid state censorship.翻译:一年前，中国各地爆发针对严格的新冠限制措施的“白皮书”抗议活动，黄义成担心，这种罕见的公开异议表现可能最终会在国家审查制度下被中国公众遗忘。

The wave of civil disobedience which erupted on Nov 25 last year was unprecedented in President Xi Jinping's decade in power, which has seen a widespread crackdown on civil society.翻译:去年11月25日爆发的公民抗命浪潮在习近平主席执政十年中是前所未有的，公民社会受到了广泛的打压。

While the protests against the zero-COVID policy were quickly suppressed by police, they helped hasten the end of three years of some of the world's strictest pandemic curbs.翻译:虽然针对零新冠政策的抗议活动很快被警方镇压，但它们帮助加速了世界上一些最严格的流行病遏制措施的三年结束。

"Many protesters experienced being part of a civic collective for the first time," said Huang, who fled to Germany in March after narrowly avoiding detention during protests in Shanghai. "For Chinese people, this is like first love."翻译:“许多抗议者第一次体验到成为公民集体的一部分，”黄说。他在上海的抗议活动中险些被拘留，并于三月份逃往德国。 “对于中国人来说，这就像初恋。”

Six participants based in China and overseas told Reuters they felt a mixture of hope and ambivalence towards the demonstrations, which they said helped to end COVID restrictions but failed to achieve lasting political change.翻译:来自中国和海外的六名参与者告诉路透社，他们对示威活动感到既希望又矛盾，他们说示威有助于结束新冠病毒限制，但未能实现持久的政治变革。

Many spoke on condition of anonymity for fear of state retribution, after last year's widespread police crackdown. Reuters was unable to confirm the total number of protesters detained last year, although some were since released.翻译:在去年警方的广泛镇压之后，由于担心国家报复，许多人都要求匿名。路透社无法确认去年被拘留的抗议者总数，尽管一些人后来被释放。

This year, on the weekend anniversary of the protests, there were no demonstrations in Beijing and Shanghai. There was also a heavy police presence at protest sites. Cities with large Chinese communities overseas, including New York, London and Washington DC, staged commemorative events.翻译:今年，在抗议活动周年纪念日的周末，北京和上海没有发生示威活动。抗议现场也有大量警察驻守。纽约、伦敦、华盛顿等海外华人社区较多的城市都举办了纪念活动。

Huang said many of his Shanghai friends walked past the main protest site to mark the anniversary, but did little else. "It's turned into a forbidden memory, like June 4th," he said, referring to the widely censored 1989 crackdown on student protesters in Tiananmen Square.翻译:黄说，他的许多上海朋友都走过主要抗议地点来纪念周年纪念日，但没有做其他事情。 “它已经变成了一种禁忌的记忆，就像 6 月 4 日一样，”他说，指的是 1989 年天安门广场上受到广泛审查的镇压学生抗议活动。

During last year's Beijing protests, some demonstrators also called for press freedom, democracy and human rights.翻译:在去年的北京抗议活动中，一些示威者还呼吁新闻自由、民主和人权。

Some of the protesters that Reuters spoke to, as well as observers, said the events helped raise awareness of how much political power Chinese people actually wielded.翻译:路透社采访的一些抗议者以及观察人士表示，这些事件有助于提高人们对中国人民实际掌握的政治权力的认识。

An Italy-based Chinese artist and blogger known as "Teacher Li", whose Twitter account became a viral conduit for protest information, told Reuters the protests "brought Chinese people's civic awareness to a new stage, and more people realised they need to stand up to protect their rights."翻译:一位被称为“李老师”的意大利华人艺术家和博主，其推特账户成为抗议信息的病毒传播渠道，他告诉路透社，抗议活动“将中国人民的公民意识提升到了一个新的阶段，更多的人意识到他们需要站起来”以保护他们的权利。”

The protests also preceded small-scale acts of subversion this year, including politically charged costumes during Halloween celebrations in Shanghai and widespread mourning over the death of former Chinese Premier Li Keqiang, who was sidelined by Xi.翻译:这些抗议活动还发生在今年的小规模颠覆活动之前，包括上海万圣节庆祝活动期间穿着带有政治色彩的服装，以及对被习近平排除在外的中国前总理李克强去世的广泛哀悼。

"I never thought that the protests would resonate so widely with people in China, where there's a high degree of monitoring," said a 30-year-old Guangzhou-based demonstrator.翻译:一名 30 岁的广州示威者表示：“我没想到抗议活动会引起如此广泛的共鸣，因为中国的监控程度很高。”

"I finally realised I'm not alone," she said. "This made me feel less pessimistic about China's future political situation, although I'm still pretty pessimistic!"翻译:“我终于意识到我并不孤单，”她说。 “这让我对中国未来的政治形势不那么悲观了，尽管我还是相当悲观！”

Other China-based participants were more ambivalent, saying they would not publicly commemorate the protests or discuss them among friends due to security concerns and a general unwillingness to revisit memories of the pandemic.翻译:其他中国参与者的态度则更为矛盾，他们表示，出于安全考虑以及普遍不愿重温这场大流行病的记忆，他们不会公开纪念这些抗议活动，也不会在朋友之间讨论这些抗议活动。

One of them, a 28-year-old Beijing tech firm employee, said she and a friend were warned by police not to take part in any activities over the weekend, even though they had not been contracted by the authorities before.翻译:其中一名 28 岁的北京科技公司员工表示，她和一名朋友被警方警告不要在周末参加任何活动，尽管她们之前并未与当局签订合同。

These warnings, and the reality of life in China, may dampen hopes for wider social change, she added.翻译:她补充说，这些警告以及中国的现实生活可能会削弱人们对更广泛的社会变革的希望。

"Even if some young first-time protesters did have a political awakening, this was probably soon overtaken by mundane concerns like the bad economy, property market and high unemployment," she said.翻译:她说：“即使一些年轻的首次抗议者确实有了政治觉醒，但这种觉醒可能很快就会被经济不景气、房地产市场和高失业率等世俗担忧所取代。”

Reporting by Laurie Chen in Beijing and Jessie Pang in Hong Kong; Additional reporting by Casey Hall, Nicoco Chan and Brenda Goh in Shanghai, and Yew Lun Tian in Beijing; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:Laurie Chen 在北京和 Jessie Pang 在香港的报道； Casey Hall、Nicoco Chan 和 Brenda Goh 在上海以及 Yew Lun Tian 在北京的补充报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑

item.title: 第三季离港居民提取退休金按年增1.7%
item.description:
Residents leaving Hong Kong for good withdrew a total of HK$2.213 billion ($283.72 million) from their Mandatory Provident Fund (MPF) pension accounts in the third quarter of 2023, up 1.7% from a year earlier, government data showed.翻译:政府数据显示，2023年第三季度，永久离开香港的居民从强制性公积金(MPF)养老金账户中提取的资金总额为22.13亿港元(合2.8372亿美元)，同比增长1.7%。

A total of 8,700 claims were made in the July-September quarter, compared with the 8,600 claims taking out HK$2.177 billion during the same period in 2022, data from the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority (MPFA) showed on Wednesday.翻译:强制性公积金计划管理局（积金局）周三公布的数据显示，7月至9月季度共提出8,700宗申索，而2022年同期为8,600宗，涉及金额达21.77亿港元。

The number of claims was higher than the 7,300 for the April-June quarter and 6,700 claims in January-March that saw withdrawals of a respective HK$1.787 billion and HK$1.573 billion.翻译:索偿人数较四月至六月季度的 7,300 宗及一月至三月的 6,700 宗为高，提取金额分别为 17.87 亿港元及 15.73 亿港元。

Curbs to control the spread of COVID-19 were among the reasons for people leaving Hong Kong, which tracked China's strict zero-COVID-19 policy closely but began easing restrictions in August last year.翻译:控制 COVID-19 传播的限制措施是人们离开香港的原因之一，香港密切关注中国严格的零 COVID-19 政策，但从去年 8 月开始放松限制。

The MPF is a compulsory retirement scheme for Hong Kong residents, with employees and their employers required to make contributions.翻译:强积金是香港居民的强制性退休计划，雇员及其雇主均须缴款。

Border checkpoints were reopened fully in February while all pandemic curbs were lifted from March 1 and authorities have been trying to restore business confidence and lure investors after more than three years of severe COVID-19 measures.翻译:边境检查站于 2 月全面重新开放，而所有大流行限制措施从 3 月 1 日起取消，当局在实施了三年多的严格的 COVID-19 措施后一直在努力恢复商业信心并吸引投资者。

The city's population increased by 152,000, or 2.1%, from the middle of last year, to 7,498,100 in June this year, marking the first significant uptick since a downward trend began in 2020 due to stringent COVID-19 measures.翻译:今年 6 月，该市人口比去年年中增加了152,000 人，即 2.1%，达到 7,498,100 人，这是自 2020 年因严格的 COVID-19 措施而开始下降趋势以来的首次显着上升。

The Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority said multiple claims for pension withdrawals are sometimes made by a single person as a scheme member may have more than one account.翻译:强制性公积金计划管理局表示，由于一名计划成员可能拥有多个账户，有时一人会提出多次提取退休金的申请。

In the third quarter of 2023, the total number of claims - spanning all reasons including retirement - was 68,500, an increase of 18.9% from the previous quarter's 57,600 claims.翻译:2023 年第三季度，涵盖包括退休在内的所有原因的索赔总数为 68,500 起，比上一季度的 57,600 起索赔增加了 18.9%。

($1 = 7.7999 Hong Kong dollars)翻译:(1 美元 = 7.7999 港元)

Reporting by Donny Kwok; Editing by Bernadette Baum翻译:郭敦尼报道；伯纳黛特·鲍姆编辑

item.title: 具有里程碑意义的香港国家安全案预计将在3至4个月内判决 - 法官
item.description:
A landmark national security trial for 16 Hong Kong democracy activists entered its final stretch on Wednesday, with a verdict expected in early 2024, over two years after they were charged with conspiracy to commit subversion.翻译:对 16 名香港民主活动人士进行的具有里程碑意义的国家安全审判于周三进入最后阶段，预计将于 2024 年初作出判决，距离他们被指控串谋颠覆已有两年多。

On the first day of closing submissions, one of the national security judges, Andrew Chan, said a verdict would "tentatively" come in three to four months, with 10 days set aside for closing submissions.翻译:在结案陈词的第一天，国家安全法官之一安德鲁·陈 (Andrew Chan) 表示，判决将“暂定”在三到四个月内做出，其中有 10 天的时间用于结案陈词。

This is the first official indication of a potential end point for the legal proceedings, which have already stretched over 100 days in court since the trial began on Feb. 6.翻译:这是该法律诉讼程序可能结束的首次正式迹象，自 2 月 6 日审判开始以来，该诉讼程序已经在法庭上持续了 100 多天。

The legal saga began with police raids on more than 50 of the city's leading democrats in early 2021 under a sweeping China-imposed national security law. Some Western governments, including the United States, have criticised the law as a tool of repression.翻译:这场法律传奇始于 2021 年初，根据中国实施的一项全面的国家安全法，警方突袭了该市 50 多名民主党领袖。包括美国在内的一些西方政府批评该法律是镇压工具。

Beijing says the national security law brought stability to the city after months long pro-democracy protests in 2019.翻译:北京表示，在 2019 年持续数月的民主抗议活动之后，国家安全法给这座城市带来了稳定。

The court case could see many leading democrats jailed for life.翻译:该法庭案件可能导致许多民主党领袖被判终身监禁。

Throughout the trial, government prosecutors have accused the democrats of hatching a conspiracy to cause a constitutional crisis and to subvert the authorities by unlawful means.翻译:在整个审判过程中，政府检察官指控民主党策划阴谋引发宪法危机，并以非法手段颠覆当局。

The prosecutors alleged that after organising a primary election aimed at maximising the democratic opposition's chances of a majority in the legislature, the democrats would then seek to "indiscriminately veto" government budgets to push the government to respond to the demands of democratic protesters.翻译:检察官声称，在组织旨在最大限度地提高民主反对派在立法机构获得多数席位的机会的初选后，民主党将寻求“不加区别地否决”政府预算，以迫使政府回应民主抗议者的要求。

The aim was to subvert state power, or force Hong Kong's leader to resign, the prosecutors said.翻译:检察官表示，其目的是颠覆国家政权，或迫使香港领导人辞职。

During the closing submission, prosecutor Jonathan Man argued that it was quite clear that acts of subversion had taken place, even without actual violence.翻译:在结案陈述中，检察官乔纳森·曼（Jonathan Man）辩称，即使没有实际的暴力，也很明显发生了颠覆行为。

"Nowadays physical violence would not be necessary," to carry out subversion, Man told the court, saying such acts were often carried out through digital means including social media.翻译:曼告诉法庭，“如今，身体暴力不再是必要的”，以进行颠覆，并表示此类行为通常是通过包括社交媒体在内的数字手段进行的。

"Communication with the public is much easier, (it's) easy to manipulate those means in order to endanger national security," he added.翻译:他补充说：“与公众的沟通更加容易，很容易操纵这些手段来危害国家安全。”

Some defence lawyers argued, however, in their closing submissions that the right to veto a budget is allowed for under the city's mini constitution, the Basic Law.翻译:然而，一些辩护律师在结案陈词中辩称，香港的小宪法《基本法》允许否决预算的权利。

Most of the democrats have been detained for more than 1,000 days since Feb. 28, 2021, on national security grounds, and were subjected to marathon bail hearings. The case has been repeatedly delayed as prosecutors requested more time to prepare. Only 13 of the original 47 democrats were granted bail.翻译:自2021年2月28日以来，大多数民主党人以国家安全为由被拘留超过1000天，并接受了马拉松式的保释听证会。由于检察官要求更多时间准备，此案一再被推迟。最初的 47 名民主党人中只有 13 人获准保释。

Thirty-one of the 47 charged have pleaded guilty - which could qualify them for reduced sentences. Only 16 are not pleading guilty, including former journalist Gwyneth Ho; activists Owen Chow and Gordon Ng; and ex-democratic lawmakers Leung Kwok-hung, Lam Cheuk-ting and Helena Wong.翻译:47 名被指控的人中有 31 人已认罪，这可能使他们有资格获得减刑。只有 16 人没有认罪，其中包括前记者 Gwyneth Ho；活动家 Owen Chow 和 Gordon Ng；以及前民主派议员梁国雄、林卓婷和黄海伦。

Those who have pleaded guilty include former law professor Benny Tai and activist Joshua Wong, who will be sentenced after the trial. Four who pleaded guilty have become prosecution witnesses.翻译:已认罪的人包括前法学教授戴耀廷和活动人士黄之锋，他们将在审判后被判刑。四名认罪者已成为控方证人。

item.title: 政策措施出台后，中国新房价格今年将攀升
item.description:
Summary:
  • New home prices will likely rise in 2024
  • Property sales, investment seen continuing to slide next year
翻译:概括：
  • 2024年新房价格可能上涨
  • 明年房地产销售和投资预计将继续下滑

Prices of new homes in China are now expected to climb 3% this year after a slew of policy measures to support the country's beleaguered property market, up from earlier expectations for prices to be flat, a Reuters poll showed.翻译:路透调查显示，在采取一系列政策措施支持中国陷入困境的房地产市场后，中国新房价格预计今年将上涨 3%，高于此前价格持平的预期。

But the poll of 11 economists, conducted Nov. 20-28, also showed expectations for 1% growth in new home prices in 2024 were little changed from an August poll. Economists said more measures from authorities are needed.翻译:但 11 月 20 日至 28 日对 11 名经济学家进行的民意调查也显示，对 2024 年新房价格增长 1% 的预期与 8 月的民意调查相比几乎没有变化。经济学家表示，当局需要采取更多措施。

Defaults on debt payments by many developers in China's cash-squeezed and highly indebted property sector have sparked fears of a broader financial crisis, weighed on consumer confidence and hindered economic growth.翻译:中国现金紧张且负债累累的房地产行业许多开发商拖欠债务，引发了人们对更广泛的金融危机的担忧，打压了消费者信心并阻碍了经济增长。

Authorities, particularly those in major cities, have embarked on a string of steps to bolster demand, including allowing smaller down payments, easing curbs on home buying such as the number of homes that can be bought, lowering borrowing costs and encouraging the extension of loans.翻译:当局，特别是大城市的当局，已采取一系列措施来提振需求，包括允许减少首付、放宽对购房的限制（例如可购买的房屋数量）、降低借贷成本以及鼓励延长贷款期限。

But most analysts believe these actions must be complemented by stronger fiscal and monetary action.翻译:但大多数分析师认为，这些行动必须辅之以更强有力的财政和货币行动。

"There is still room for easing property policies in major cities in 2024 ... The market in first and second tier cities will continue to outperform third and fourth cities next year, " said Huang Yu, an analyst at real estate research firm China Index Academy.翻译:房地产研究公司中国指数分析师黄宇表示，“2024年主要城市房地产政策仍有宽松空间……明年一二线城市市场将继续跑赢三四线城市”学院。

Estimates for home unit sales for 2023 were revised down to an 8% slide compared with predictions of a 5% drop in August, the poll also showed. Economists also expect declines next year, predicting a 5% fall.翻译:民意调查还显示，与 8 月份预测的下降 5% 相比，2023 年房屋销售预期下调至 8%。经济学家还预计明年将出现下降，预计下降 5%。

"The key reason is that homebuyer confidence has not yet been fully rebuilt," said Wang Xingping, a senior analyst at Fitch Bohua.翻译:惠誉博华高级分析师王兴平表示：“关键原因是购房者信心尚未完全重建。”

According to the poll, property investment is expected to slump 10% in 2023 and then 8.4% in 2024.翻译:调查显示，预计 2023 年房地产投资将下降 10%，2024 年将下降 8.4%。

Regulators are drafting a list of 50 property developers eligible for a range of financing support, including Country Garden (2007.HK) and state-backed China Vanke (000002.SZ), Bloomberg reported last week.翻译:据彭博社上周报道，监管机构正在起草一份有资格获得一系列融资支持的 50 家房地产开发商名单，其中包括碧桂园(2007.HK)和国家支持的万科(000002.SZ) 。

(For other stories from the Reuters quarterly housing market polls)翻译:（有关路透社季度房地产市场民意调查的其他报道）

item.title: 中国最高外交官王毅将于周四访问越南 - 消息人士
item.description:
China's top diplomat Wang Yi will visit Vietnam from Thursday, two Vietnamese sources with knowledge of trip said on Wednesday.翻译:两名越南消息人士周三表示，中国最高外交官王毅将从周四开始访问越南。

"He is expected to attend a Vietnam-China inter-government meeting in Hanoi on Friday," one of the sources said.翻译:一位消息人士称：“预计他将于周五出席在河内举行的越南-中国政府间会议。”

Vietnam's and China's foreign ministries did not immediately respond to a requests for comment.翻译:越南和中国外交部没有立即回应置评请求。

China has had traditionally strong ties with Vietnam since diplomatic relations were established in 1950, despite a brief war in 1979.翻译:自 1950 年建交以来，中国与越南传统上一直保持着牢固的关系，尽管 1979 年发生了短暂的战争。

China is Vietnam's largest trading partner and a vital source of imports for its manufacturing sector.翻译:中国是越南最大的贸易伙伴，也是越南制造业的重要进口来源地。

China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao on Monday during a visit to Vietnam pledged to further open the Chinese market to Vietnamese agricultural products as the two countries seek to deepen trade ties, according to Vietnam's Ministry of Industry and Trade.翻译:据越南工贸部称，中国商务部部长王文涛周一在访问越南期间承诺，随着两国寻求深化贸易关系，将进一步向越南农产品开放中国市场。

Reuters last month reported that Vietnamese and Chinese officials were preparing for a possible trip by Chinese President Xi Jinping to Hanoi. At the time, plans were for the trip to take place at the end of October or in early November. Three Hanoi-based diplomats subsequently said the visit was likely to be postponed to December.翻译:路透社上个月报道称，越南和中国官员正在为中国国家主席习近平可能访问河内做准备。当时计划在十月底或十一月初进行这次旅行。三名驻河内外交官随后表示，此次访问可能会推迟到 12 月。

Bilateral trade between Vietnam and China rose 5.5% last year to $175.5 billion, with shipments from China to Vietnam accounting for 67%, according to the ministry.翻译:据越南商务部称，去年越南和中国的双边贸易增长了5.5%，达到1755亿美元，其中中国对越南的出口额占67%。

Reporting by Hanoi bureau, additional reporting by Ryan Woo in Beijing; Editing by Kanupriya Kapoor翻译:河内分社报道，北京吴瑞安补充报道；卡努普里亚·卡普尔 编辑

item.title: 中国11月份工厂活动可能连续第二个月收缩
item.description:
China's manufacturing activity likely contracted for a second consecutive month in November, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday, keeping alive calls for further stimulus measures as factory owners struggle for orders both at home and abroad.翻译:路透社周三的一项民意调查显示，中国11月份制造业活动可能连续第二个月萎缩，在工厂主努力争取国内外订单之际，要求采取进一步刺激措施的呼声依然高涨。

While the official purchasing managers' index (PMI) is expected to have improved to 49.7 in November from last month's unexpected drop to 49.5, the median forecast of 31 economists in a Reuters poll has the index staying below the 50-point level demarcating contraction from expansion.翻译:虽然官方采购经理人指数 (PMI) 预计 11 月将从上个月意外下降的 49.5 改善至 49.7，但路透调查中 31 名经济学家的预测中值显示，该指数仍低于 50 点的水平，标志着经济萎缩。扩张。

Economists appear in agreement that the economy is still largely struggling for traction despite some signs of green shoots in mixed October data, with all respondents returning readings between 49.0 and 50.2 and the vast majority predicting a small contraction of between 49.6 and 49.8.翻译:经济学家们似乎一致认为，尽管 10 月份混合数据出现了一些复苏迹象，但经济在很大程度上仍难以获得牵引力，所有受访者的读数都在 49.0 至 50.2 之间，绝大多数人预测将出现小幅收缩，在 49.6 至 49.8 之间。

The world's second-largest economy has been unable to mount a strong post-COVID recovery this year as a deep crisis in the property market, local government debt risks, slow global growth and geopolitical tensions dented momentum.翻译:由于房地产市场的深度危机、地方政府债务风险、全球经济增长缓慢和地缘政治紧张局势削弱了经济增长势头，全球第二大经济体今年未能在疫情后实现强劲复苏。

A flurry of policy support measures has had only a modest effect, raising pressure on authorities to roll out more stimulus.翻译:一系列政策支持措施收效甚微，加大了当局推出更多刺激措施的压力。

Profit growth at China's industrial firms shrank back to the low single digits last month, following an 11.9% increase in September and a 17.2% gain in August, which analysts attributed to volatile input costs. Both new export and import orders shrank in October.翻译:继9月份增长11.9%和8月份增长17.2%之后，中国工业企业利润增速上个月回落至低个位数，分析师将其归因于投入成本波动。 10月份新出口和进口订单均出现萎缩。

The sputtering recovery has prompted many analysts to warn that China may begin flirting with Japan-style stagnation later this decade unless policymakers take steps to reorientate the economy towards household consumption and market-allocation of resources.翻译:缓慢的复苏促使许多分析师警告称，除非政策制定者采取措施将经济重新定位为家庭消费和资源市场配置，否则中国可能会在本十年晚些时候开始陷入日本式的停滞。

China's central bank governor said on Tuesday he was "confident that China will enjoy healthy and sustainable growth in 2024 and beyond," but urged structural reforms to reduce reliance on infrastructure and property for growth.翻译:中国央行行长周二表示，他“相信中国将在2024年及以后实现健康、可持续的增长”，但敦促进行结构性改革，减少增长对基础设施和房地产的依赖。

Policy advisers say the government will need to implement further stimulus should it wish to sustain an annual economic growth target of 'around 5%' next year, which would match this year's goal.翻译:政策顾问表示，如果政府希望明年维持“5%左右”的年度经济增长目标（这将与今年的目标相匹配），那么政府将需要实施进一步的刺激措施。

The official PMI will be released on Thursday. The private Caixin factory survey will be issued on Friday, and analysts expect its reading to edge up to 49.8 from 49.5 in October.翻译:官方采购经理人指数将于周四发布。私营财新工厂调查将于周五发布，分析师预计其读数将从 10 月份的 49.5 升至 49.8。

item.title: 负债累累的中国地方政府争相发行210亿美元专项债券救助小银行
item.description:
Local governments in China have sold record amounts of so-called special bonds this year to inject capital into struggling smaller banks, as authorities seek to contain spillover risks from a deepening property crisis and a sputtering economy.翻译:中国地方政府今年发行了创纪录数量的所谓特别债券，为陷入困境的小型银行注入资金，当局试图遏制房地产危机加深和经济不景气带来的溢出风险。

Special-purpose bonds are a form of off-budget debt financing used by local governments in China, with the proceeds raised typically earmarked for specific policy goals, such as spending on infrastructure projects.翻译:特殊用途债券是中国地方政府使用的一种预算外债务融资形式，筹集的资金通常专门用于特定的政策目标，例如基础设施项目支出。

Local governments plan to use the proceeds of the latest bond sales to purchase equity or convertible bonds from smaller banks, most of them state-owned, effectively recapitalising them, according to the deal prospectuses.翻译:交易招股说明书显示，地方政府计划利用最新发债所得的资金，从规模较小的银行（其中大多数是国有银行）购买股权或可转换债券，从而有效地对这些银行进行资本重组。

The governments have raised 152.3 billion yuan ($21.05 billion) via such bonds so far in 2023 to replenish the capital of small and medium-sized banks, according to data from the official China Electronic Local Government Bond Market Access.翻译:根据中国电子地方政府债券市场准入的官方数据，2023年迄今为止，政府已通过此类债券筹集了1523亿元人民币（210.5亿美元），以补充中小型银行的资本。

But total funds raised so far are modest compared to the banks' needs, analysts say.翻译:但分析师表示，与银行的需求相比，迄今为止筹集的资金总额并不多。

China's small, regional banks would need to address a capital shortfall of an estimated 2.2 trillion yuan based on a scenario where up to 20% of regional lenders face capital inadequacy, according to an October report by S&P Global Ratings.翻译:标准普尔全球评级公司 10 月份的一份报告显示，如果高达 20% 的地区性银行面临资本不足的情况，中国小型地区性银行将需要解决估计 2.2 万亿元人民币的资本短缺问题。

Highlighting Beijing's push to avoid a financial crisis like the one in 2008, the value of special-purpose bonds issued this year is already more than double the 63 billion yuan issued in 2022, and is the highest on record since such instruments were introduced in 2020 to help smaller lenders impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:今年发行的特殊用途债券的价值已经是2022年发行的630亿元人民币的两倍多，并且是自2020年推出此类工具以来的最高记录，突显了北京为避免2008年那样的金融危机所做的努力帮助受 COVID-19 大流行影响的小型贷方。

The trend highlights how more and more of the country's smaller banks are being propped up with government support, amid a deepening crisis in the property market, which accounts for about a quarter of the economy.翻译:这一趋势突显出，在占经济约四分之一的房地产市场危机日益加深之际，越来越多的中国小型银行得到了政府的支持。

Authorities have been ramping up measures to support real estate, including relaxing home purchase restrictions and lowering borrowing costs, although these have failed to shore up a meaningful recovery.翻译:当局一直在加大支持房地产的措施，包括放宽购房限制和降低借贷成本，尽管这些措施未能支撑有意义的复苏。

The People's Bank of China (PBOC) and the National Financial Regulatory Administration (NFRA) did not respond to Reuters request for comment.

DEEPER IN DEBT

The intensified efforts to support smaller banks also come amid growing worries about the impact of ballooning local government debt on the economy.翻译:在加大力度支持小型银行之际，人们越来越担心地方政府债务不断膨胀对经济的影响。

Local government debt reached 92 trillion yuan ($12.6 trillion), or 76% of China's economic output in 2022, up from 62.2% in 2019, according to the latest data from the International Monetary Fund.翻译:根据国际货币基金组织的最新数据，到2022年，地方政府债务将达到92万亿元人民币（12.6万亿美元），占中国经济产出的76%，高于2019年的62.2%。

While policymakers are highly concerned over rising debt levels, Beijing has little option but to support smaller banks to contain spillover risks, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，尽管政策制定者高度关注债务水平上升，但北京别无选择，只能支持规模较小的银行遏制溢出风险。

"It is important to avoid any failures of even the smallest institutions, as a single failure could generate knock-on effects and spread financial contagion to other financial institutions," said Gavekal Dragonomics researcher Zhang Xiaoxi.翻译:龙洲经讯研究员张晓曦表示：“即使是最小的机构，也要避免出现任何倒闭，因为单一的倒闭可能会产生连锁反应，并将金融危机蔓延到其他金融机构。”

It was not immediately clear if the central authorities had given any guidance to the local governments on recapitalising smaller banks, and who were the buyers of these special-purpose bonds.翻译:目前尚不清楚中央是否已就小型银行资本重组向地方政府提供任何指导，以及这些特殊用途债券的买家是谁。

Some provinces are accelerating plans to reform and defuse risks at local, high-risk small and medium-sized banks and to replenish capital via multiple channels, central bank governor Pan Gongsheng said in Beijing earlier this month.

CONTAGION RISK

Local governments and banks are fundamental to China's economy, with Beijing tasking provincial and city officials with meeting ambitious growth targets.翻译:地方政府和银行对中国经济至关重要，北京向省市官员下达了实现雄心勃勃的增长目标的任务。

But after years of over-investment in infrastructure, plummeting returns from land sales, and soaring COVID costs, economists say debt-laden municipalities now represent a major risk to the world's second-largest economy.翻译:但经济学家表示，经过多年对基础设施的过度投资、土地销售回报大幅下降以及新冠疫情成本飙升，负债累累的城市现在对世界第二大经济体构成了重大风险。

The issuance of fresh debt by the local governments to recapitalise banks, coming at a time when their own liabilities are growing rapidly, could make the financial balancing act for municipalities even more precarious.翻译:地方政府在自身负债迅速增长之际发行新债以对银行进行资本重组，可能会使市政当局的财务平衡行为变得更加不稳定。

On top of $21 billion raised so far this year, the Henan provincial government last week announced a plan to issue 28.2 billion yuan worth of special purpose bonds to recapitalise 26 local banks, according to the government website.

WEAK LINKS

Smaller regional banks are the weak links in China's $61 trillion financial sector, due to their industrial, sectoral and geographical concentration, opaque governance, and lack of stringent regulatory oversight.翻译:由于行业、部门和地域集中、治理不透明以及缺乏严格的监管，小型区域性银行是中国 61 万亿美元金融部门的薄弱环节。

As of end-September, China's rural commercial banks reported a 3.18% non-performing loan ratio with city commercial banks at 1.91%, data from the NFRA showed, higher than the average of 1.61% in the banking sector.翻译:NFRA数据显示，截至9月底，中国农村商业银行不良贷款率为3.18%，城市商业银行不良贷款率为1.91%，高于银行业1.61%的平均水平。

Many analysts believe the real amount of soured loans is far higher.翻译:许多分析师认为，不良贷款的实际数量要高得多。

Smaller Chinese banks face greater challenges in raising funds to replenish their balance sheets compared with their large peers, because of their lower creditworthiness, limited operating scope and risk profiles.翻译:与大型银行相比，规模较小的中国银行在筹集资金补充资产负债表方面面临更大的挑战，因为它们的信用度较低，经营范围和风险状况有限。

Among the top issuers of the special bonds this year are debt-laden provincial governments in Liaoning, Yunnan and the government in Inner Mongolia region, which aim to use the proceeds to recapitalise local banks.翻译:今年特别债券的最大发行者是负债累累的辽宁省、云南省政府和内蒙古地区政府，它们的目的是利用所得资金对当地银行进行资本重组。

Regional banks operating primarily in weaker regions heavily exposed to indebted local government financing vehicles bear higher credit risks than their peers in wealthy regions, S&P analysts said in last month's research note.翻译:标准普尔分析师在上个月的研究报告中表示，主要在实力较弱地区运营、地方政府融资工具负债累累的地区性银行比富裕地区的同行承担更高的信贷风险。

"Local governments are a likely the first line of defense whenever regional banks become stressed," they said. "Nevertheless, we expect local-government support to strained lenders will be selective."翻译:他们表示：“每当地区性银行面临压力时，地方政府可能是第一道防线。” “尽管如此，我们预计地方政府对紧张的贷方的支持将是有选择性的。”

Reporting by Ziyi Tang and Ryan Woo; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Kim Coghill翻译:唐子仪和吴瑞安报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee 和 Kim Coghill

item.title: 中国恒大集团对母公司提起法律诉讼
item.description:
Evergrande Property Services Group (6666.HK) said on Tuesday one of its units had commenced legal proceedings against Hengda Real Estate Group Company and embattled developer China Evergrande (3333.HK), among others.翻译:恒大物业服务集团（6666.HK）周二表示，其旗下之一已对恒大地产集团公司和陷入困境的开发商中国恒大（3333.HK）等公司提起法律诉讼。

The unit, Jinbi Property Management Company, has commenced the proceedings for the recovery of about 2 billion yuan ($279.60 million) deposit certificate pledge guarantees.翻译:该单位金碧物业管理公司已启动追回约20亿元人民币（2.796亿美元）存单质押担保的程序。

The proceedings are related to the enforcement of Evergrande Property Services' deposit pledge of about 13.4 billion yuan.翻译:该诉讼涉及恒大物业约134亿元存款质押的执行。

Jinbi Property has also commenced legal proceedings against Shenzhen Qihang Metals Materials Company, Guizhou Guangjuyuan Real Estate Development and Hengda Real Estate Group Guiyang Property.翻译:金碧置业还对深圳市启航金属材料公司、贵州广聚源房地产开发有限公司和恒大地产集团贵阳置业提起法律诉讼。

In February, parent Evergrande had said it was in talks with Evergrande Property Services to repay the funds.翻译:今年2月，母公司恒大集团曾表示，正在与恒大物业洽谈偿还资金事宜。

In July 2022, Evergrande's chief executive and its finance head resigned after a preliminary probe found their involvement in diverting loans secured by Evergrande Property Services.翻译:2022年7月，恒大首席执行官和财务负责人因涉嫌挪用恒大物业担保贷款而辞职。

Evergrande was investigating how deposits worth 13.4 billion yuan belonging to Evergrande Property Services were used as collateral for pledge guarantees and seized by banks.翻译:恒大正在调查恒大物业的134亿元存款如何被用作质押担保的抵押品，并被银行扣押。

Evergrande Property Services has received a notice from the Guangzhou Intermediate People's Court of Guangdong Province formally accepting the filing of the case, it said on Tuesday.翻译:恒大物业周二表示，已收到广东省广州市中级人民法院正式立案的通知。

($1 = 7.1532 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1532 人民币）

item.title: 中国在供应链博览会上反击西方的去风险策略
item.description:
Summary:
  • China warns protectionism, geopolitical tensions threaten supply chains
  • China says wants closer supply chain ties with all
  • US, EU greenfield investment into China dropped $100 billion between 2018-2022 - study
  • US, EU 'de-risking' strategies overplay risk level - analysts
翻译:概括：
  • 中国警告保护主义、地缘政治紧张局势威胁供应链
  • 中国表示希望与所有国家建立更紧密的供应链联系
  • 研究显示，2018年至2022年间，美国和欧盟对华绿地投资减少1000亿美元
  • 分析师称美国和欧盟的“去风险”策略夸大了风险水平

China opposes protectionism and wants to strengthen supply chains with all countries, Premier Li Qiang said on Tuesday, as a growing number of nations voice concern at how much their supply chains depend on the world's second largest economy.翻译:中国总理李强周二表示，中国反对保护主义，希望加强与所有国家的供应链，越来越多的国家对其供应链对世界第二大经济体的依赖程度表示担忧。

Li's comments comes amid calls over the past year from the United States and the European Union to reduce their dependence on China in certain sectors and "de-risk" their supply chains, as well as efforts to cut off Chinese enterprises from some advanced semiconductors.翻译:李克强发表上述言论之际，美国和欧盟在过去一年中呼吁减少在某些领域对中国的依赖并“降低供应链风险” ，并努力切断中国企业对某些先进半导体的供应。

"We are willing to build closer production and industrial supply chain partnerships with all countries," Li told the first China International Supply Chain Expo (CISCE), adding that the international community needs to be "more wary of the challenges and risks brought about by protectionism and uncontrolled globalisation."翻译:李克强在首届中国国际供应链博览会上表示：“我们愿意与各国建立更紧密的生产和产业供应链伙伴关系。”他补充说，国际社会需要“更加警惕供应链带来的挑战和风险”。保护主义和不受控制的全球化。”

Recent geopolitical tensions, from Russia's war in Ukraine to concerns over a future Chinese invasion of Taiwan, have led a growing number of foreign businesses to opt against expanding their supply chains in China, instead directing investment to countries including India, Mexico and Vietnam that enjoy better ties with the United States, a strategy known as China-plus-one.翻译:最近的地缘政治紧张局势，从俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争，到对中国未来入侵台湾的担忧， 导致越来越多的外国企业选择不扩大在中国的供应链，而是将投资转向印度、墨西哥和越南等享有便利条件的国家。与美国建立更好的关系，这一战略被称为“中国加一”。

The expo, organised by the state-run China Council for the Promotion of International Trade (CCPIT), is Beijing's latest bid to increase foreign investment in China, which has dropped to historic lows.翻译:此次进博会由国营的中国国际贸易促进委员会（CCPIT）主办，是北京为增加对华外国投资而采取的最新举措，目前中国的外国投资已降至历史低点。

The value of announced U.S. and European greenfield investment into China dropped to less than $20 billion last year, from a peak of $120 billion in 2018, according to Rhodium Group, while investment into India shot up by some $65 billion or 400% between 2021 and 2022.翻译:根据荣鼎集团的数据，美国和欧洲宣布的对华绿地投资额从 2018 年 1200 亿美元的峰值降至去年的不足 200 亿美元，而对印度的投资在 2021 年至 2021 年期间猛增约 650 亿美元，即 400%。 2022 年。

Despite this decrease, China remains an attractive option: a survey conducted by HSBC bank at the China International Import Expo (CIIE) earlier this month showed 45% of firms expect to expand their supply chain in China over the next year.翻译:尽管下降，中国仍然是一个有吸引力的选择：汇丰银行本月早些时候在中国国际进口博览会（CIIE）上进行的一项调查显示，45%的企业预计明年将扩大在中国的供应链。

"I think there is a lot of hyperbole around this. And I'm not sure whether the (de-risking) measures the EU or U.S. are considering match the scale of the risk," said Dan Marks, research fellow for energy security at the Royal United Services think tank.翻译:“我认为这有很多夸张的成分。而且我不确定欧盟或美国正在考虑的（去风险）措施是否与风险的规模相匹配，”能源安全研究员丹·马克斯说。皇家联合军种智囊团。

An apparent improvement in U.S.-Sino ties, after Chinese President Xi Jinping recently met U.S. President Joe Biden and participated in the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Summit, should also help reinforce China's position as a key manufacturing hub.翻译:在中国国家主席习近平最近会见美国总统乔·拜登并参加亚太经合组织（APEC）峰会之后，中美关系明显改善，也应有助于巩固中国作为主要制造业中心的地位。

Zhang Shaogang, a CCPIT official who was part of the Chinese delegation at the APEC summit, said last week that 20% of the foreign firms exhibiting at the supply chain expo were U.S.-based, and included Amazon (AMZN.O), Apple (AAPL.O), Tesla (TSLA.O), and Intel (INTC.O).翻译:参加APEC峰会的中国代表团成员、中国贸促会官员张绍刚上周表示，参加供应链博览会的外国企业中有20%是美国企业，其中包括亚马逊(AMZN.O) 、苹果(Apple )等。 AAPL.O） 、特斯拉（TSLA.O）和英特尔（INTC.O） 。

"We wholeheartedly hope U.S. businesses can...while actively realising their own development, also positively promote the healthy, stable, and long-term development of U.S.-China relations," Zhang said.翻译:我们衷心希望美国企业在积极实现自身发展的同时，也积极推动美中关系健康稳定长期发展。

Reporting by Eduardo Baptista and Joe Cash; Editing by Jamie Freed and Miral Fahmy翻译:爱德华多·巴普蒂斯塔和乔·卡什的报道；编辑：杰米·弗里德和米拉尔·法赫米

item.title: 中国习近平敦促在“外部风险”下加强海外法治
item.description:
President Xi Jinping has called for stronger rule of law related to foreign affairs given "external risks and challenges" as China opens up to the outside world, state media reported on Tuesday.翻译:据官方媒体周二报道，鉴于中国对外开放的“外部风险和挑战”，国家主席习近平呼吁加强与外交相关的法治。

Xi, speaking during a study session of the Communist's Party's powerful political bureau, said that to protect its overseas citizens and interests, it was necessary to deepen international cooperation on law enforcement, strengthen consular protection and assistance, and build strong rule of law.翻译:习近平在中共政治局学习时表示，保护海外公民和利益，必须深化国际执法合作，加强领事保护和协助，建设坚强法治。

China's private companies have run into legal challenges abroad in recent years, from U.S. accusations on counterfeit and pirated goods sold on online platforms owned by Tencent Holdings (0700.HK) and Alibaba Group (9988.HK), to steps to ban the TikTok video app, owned by Chinese tech firm ByteDance, in Nepal.翻译:近年来，中国私营企业在海外遭遇法律挑战，从美国指控腾讯控股（0700.HK）和阿里巴巴集团（9988.HK）旗下在线平台销售假冒盗版商品，到禁止 TikTok 视频的措施应用程序，由中国科技公司字节跳动在 尼泊尔拥有。

Xi said in the Monday speech it was necessary to raise compliance awareness and guide the public and enterprises to abide by laws, regulations and customs in the process of "going global".翻译:习近平在周一的讲话中表示，要提高合规意识，引导公众和企业在“走出去”过程中遵守法律法规和习俗。

To facilitate economic and trade exchanges, authorities say Chinese law firms have set up 180 overseas offices in 35 countries and regions, an increase of nearly 50% since 2018.翻译:为便利经贸往来，有关部门表示，中国律师事务所已在35个国家和地区设立了180个海外办事处，自2018年以来增长了近50%。

China needs to actively develop foreign-related legal services and cultivate world-class arbitration institutions and law firms, Xi said.翻译:习近平指出，我国要积极发展涉外法律服务，培育世界一流仲裁机构和律师事务所。

But authorities in some Western countries, including the U.S., Canada, Britain and the Netherlands, have accused China of illegally setting up "overseas police service centres" to monitor its overseas citizens, accusations that Beijing vehemently denies.翻译:但包括美国、加拿大、英国和荷兰在内的一些西方国家当局指责中国非法设立“海外警察服务中心”来监视其海外公民，北京方面强烈否认这一指控。

China says such centres are meant to help its citizens renew expired driving licences, and are run by Chinese volunteers, not law enforcement officers.翻译:中国表示，这些中心旨在帮助其公民更新过期的驾驶执照，并且由中国志愿者而非执法人员运营。

The call to better protect citizens abroad coincides with recent outbreaks of conflict in countries such as Ukraine and Sudan that have led to China organising evacuations of its people.翻译:在呼吁更好地保护海外公民的同时，乌克兰和苏丹等国最近爆发了冲突，导致中国组织了人员撤离。

China has organised almost 20 evacuations and dealt with more than 500,000 cases of consular protection involving millions of its people over the past decade, according to the foreign ministry.翻译:据外交部称，过去十年来，中国组织了近20次撤侨行动，处理了超过50万起领事保护案件，涉及数百万人。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 西方的去风险化举措开始损害中国的前景
item.description:
Summary:
  • China records first quarterly foreign direct investment deficit
  • Execs worry about China slowdown, geopolitics, regulations
  • Trend could weigh on yuan, chip away at growth potential-analyst
  • China-focused buyout fundraising has ground to a halt-data
翻译:概括：
  • 中国首次出现季度外国直接投资赤字
  • 高管担心中国经济放缓、地缘政治和监管
  • 分析师称，趋势可能会对人民币造成压力，削弱增长潜力
  • 以中国为重点的收购融资已陷入停滞数据

U.S. furniture company head Jordan England thinks his firm's Chinese suppliers are among the best in the game, but geopolitics and a slowing economy have pushed him to source more products from Southeast Asia, Eastern Europe and Mexico.翻译:美国家具公司负责人乔丹·英格兰认为，他的公司的中国供应商是业内最好的供应商之一，但地缘政治和经济放缓迫使他从东南亚、东欧和墨西哥采购更多产品。

"I'm looking to move away from it (China)," said England, CEO and co-founder of Florida-based Industry West.翻译:总部位于佛罗里达州的 Industry West 的首席执行官兼联合创始人 England 表示：“我正在寻求离开（中国）。”

"It was always 'China plus one,'" he said, referring to the diversification strategy many businesses began implementing after Washington imposed trade tariffs on Beijing in 2018 to ensure they were not wholly dependent on Chinese suppliers.翻译:“总是‘中国加一’，”他说，指的是2018年华盛顿对北京征收贸易关税后许多企业开始实施的多元化战略，以确保它们不完全依赖中国供应商。

Now "it's like 'plus-10' and then China," he added, with the latter down to providing half of Industry West's products and being trimmed more.翻译:现在“就像‘+10’，然后是中国，”他补充道，后者减少到提供工业西部一半的产品，并进行了更多削减。

Foreign investors have been sour on China for most of this year, but data released over the past month has provided clear evidence of the negative impact de-risking strategies are having on the world's second-largest economy.翻译:今年大部分时间里，外国投资者一直对中国感到不满，但过去一个月发布的数据清楚地证明了去风险策略对世界第二大经济体产生的负面影响。

Activity surveys showed manufacturing unexpectedly contracted in October, while exports accelerated their decline. China recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment in July-September, suggesting capital outflow pressure.翻译:活动调查显示，10 月份制造业意外收缩，而出口则加速下滑。中国7-9月外国直接投资首次出现季度逆差，显示资本外流压力。

Nicholas Lardy, senior researcher at the Peterson Institute for International Economics, said in a note the new data imply that foreign firms are not only declining to reinvest earnings, but are selling existing investments and repatriating funds.翻译:彼得森国际经济研究所高级研究员尼古拉斯·拉迪在一份报告中表示，新数据表明外国公司不仅拒绝将收益再投资，而且正在出售现有投资并将资金汇回国内。

This trend could further weaken the yuan and clip China's economic growth potential, he added.翻译:他补充说，这种趋势可能会进一步削弱人民币并削弱中国的经济增长潜力。

"In recent years, the scale, proportion and growth rate of foreign investment absorbed by China have all remained at a relatively high level," He Yadong, a Chinese commerce ministry spokesperson, said in response to a question from Reuters.

LONG-TERM PROSPECTS

Businesses have longstanding worries about geopolitics, tightening regulations and a more favourable playing field for state-owned companies. But for the first time in the four decades since China opened up to foreign investments, executives are now also concerned about long-term growth prospects.翻译:企业界长期以来对地缘政治、收紧监管以及国有企业更有利的竞争环境感到担忧。但自中国向外国投资开放四十年来，高管们首次对长期增长前景表示担忧。

A survey released last week by The Conference Board, a think tank, showed more than two-thirds of the CEOs who responded said China's demand has not returned to pre-COVID levels, with 40% expecting a decrease in capital investments in the country over the next six months and a similar proportion expecting to cut jobs.翻译:智库世界大型企业联合会上周发布的一项调查显示，超过三分之二的受访首席执行官表示，中国的需求尚未恢复到新冠疫情爆发前的水平，其中 40% 的受访者预计中国的资本投资将在未来六个月，预计裁员的比例类似。

China is outwardly confident about growth despite a global economic slowdown, with policy advisers favouring a target of about a 5% expansion of gross domestic product in 2024 and the country aiming to double the economy's size by 2035.翻译:尽管全球经济放缓，但中国表面上对增长充满信心，政策顾问支持2024年国内生产总值增长约5%的目标，并计划到2035年将经济规模扩大一倍。

But England said he is concerned about how his Chinese suppliers that also produce for the domestic market will cope with the country's severe property market downturn.翻译:但英格兰表示，他担心同样为国内市场生产的中国供应商将如何应对该国严重的房地产市场低迷。

"I'm worried about these factories going from 500 workers to 200, to 100," he said.

OPEN FOR BUSINESS?

Premier Li Qiang's overtures declaring China open for business to foreign investors after the pandemic have been greeted with scepticism in some Western boardrooms in light of a broader anti-espionage law, raids on consultancies and due diligence firms and exit bans, trade bodies say.翻译:贸易机构表示，鉴于更广泛的反间谍法、对咨询公司和尽职调查公司的突击检查以及出境禁令，疫情后李强总理宣布中国向外国投资者开放的提议遭到了一些西方董事会的怀疑。

Li is expected to make a similar call on Tuesday at the country's inaugural China International Supply Chain Expo, which it is expected to use to tout its supply chain advantages.翻译:预计李克强将于周二在中国首届中国国际供应链博览会上发表类似的讲话，预计中国将利用该博览会宣传其供应链优势。

"Foreign business executives here are eager to continue in China," AmCham President Michael Hart said. "But boards back in the U.S. are wary."翻译:“这里的外国企业高管渴望继续在中国发展，”美国商会主席迈克尔·哈特说。 “但美国的董事会对此持谨慎态度。”

European firms have raised fair competition concerns about state-directed lending to Chinese manufacturers, while Noah Fraser, managing director of the Canada China Business Council, said "bad blood" remains over the detention of two Canadians from 2018 to 2021.翻译:欧洲公司对国家向中国制造商提供的贷款提出了公平竞争担忧，而加中贸易理事会董事总经理诺亚·弗雷泽(Noah Fraser)表示，2018年至2021年两名加拿大人被拘留的问题仍然存在“不和”。

In private equity, while Asia-focused funds have allocated capital to China, data from Preqin shows that as of Nov. 24, no China-focused buyout fund had been raised in 2023 in any currency, compared with $210 million in 2022 and $13.2 billion in 2019, before the pandemic.翻译:在私募股权领域，虽然专注于亚洲的基金已向中国配置资金，但Preqin的数据显示，截至11月24日，2023年没有以任何货币筹集专注于中国的收购基金，而2022年为2.1亿美元，2022年为132亿美元。 2019年，疫情爆发之前。

Primavera Capital founder Fred Hu cites mounting macroeconomic uncertainty, a "murky capital market outlook," and lingering concerns over past regulatory crackdowns on high-growth industries such as technology and education.翻译:春华资本创始人胡祖六表示，宏观经济不确定性不断增加、“资本市场前景黯淡”，以及对过去对科技和教育等高增长行业的监管打压的持续担忧。

"Tech firms and other private enterprises must be able to tap public markets for financing and liquidity, so the current market conditions in China do considerable harm to the real economy," said Hu, adding China-focused private equity firms were diverting capital to Southeast Asia, Australia and Europe.翻译:胡说：“科技公司和其他私营企业必须能够利用公共市场进行融资和流动性，因此中国目前的市场状况对实体经济造成了相当大的损害。”他补充说，专注于中国的私募股权公司正在将资金转移到东南部亚洲、澳大利亚和欧洲。

Despite the challenges, foreign investment flows are not unidirectional. Many firms, especially in the retail sector, still target China's giant market. McDonald's (MCD.N) said last week it had struck a deal to boost its stake in its China business.翻译:尽管面临挑战，外国投资流动并不是单向的。许多公司，尤其是零售行业的公司，仍然瞄准中国这个巨大的市场。麦当劳(MCD.N)上周表示，已达成一项协议，以增持其在中国业务的股份。

An executive at a European hotel chain, who spoke on condition of anonymity due to the topic's sensitivity, said his firm was happy to reinvest profits in China for now.翻译:一位欧洲连锁酒店的高管因话题敏感性而不愿透露姓名，他表示，他的公司目前很乐意将利润再投资到中国。

"We know what's going on politically and yes, economically," he said, adding the latest data "was nothing to be proud of."翻译:他说：“我们知道政治上正在发生什么，是的，经济上也发生了什么事。”他补充说，最新数据“没有什么值得骄傲的”。

"It's slow, but only warrants taking a 'wait and see approach.'"翻译:“虽然速度很慢，但只能采取‘观望态度’。”

item.title: 马来西亚MH370客机失踪中国家属向法庭寻求赔偿
item.description:
A Beijing court on Monday began compensation hearings for the Chinese relatives of passengers on board Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, which mysteriously disappeared over the Indian Ocean almost a decade ago, the plaintiffs said.翻译:原告称，北京一家法院周一开始为马来西亚航空公司 MH370 航班乘客的中国亲属举行赔偿听证会，该航班近十年前在印度洋神秘失踪。

Over 150 Chinese passengers were on the flight which vanished en route from Kuala Lumpur to Beijing on March 8, 2014. Malaysian investigators did not rule out the possibility that the aircraft had been deliberately taken off course, and debris confirmed or believed to be from the aircraft has washed up along the coast of Africa and on islands in the Indian Ocean.翻译:2014 年 3 月 8 日，这架航班在从吉隆坡飞往北京的途中失踪，机上载有 150 多名中国乘客。马来西亚调查人员不排除飞机被故意偏离航线的可能性，残骸已确认或相信来自飞机。飞机被冲到非洲海岸和印度洋岛屿上。

Relatives of these passengers said they were demanding compensation from Malaysia Airlines, Boeing, aircraft engine maker Rolls-Royce and Allianz insurance group among others.翻译:这些乘客的亲属表示，他们要求马来西亚航空、波音公司、飞机发动机制造商劳斯莱斯和安联保险集团等提供赔偿。

The court did not release any details on the case, but state media said more than 40 relatives were seeking between 10 million and 80 million yuan ($1.4 million and $11.2 million) each in compensation.翻译:法院没有公布该案的任何细节，但官方媒体称，40 多名亲属正在寻求每人 1000 万至 8000 万元人民币（140 万美元至 1120 万美元）的赔偿。

Malaysia Airlines, Rolls-Royce, Allianz and Boeing did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:马来西亚航空、劳斯莱斯、安联和波音没有立即回应置评请求。

Holding up signs saying "resume the search" and "re-establish an international investigation team", Jiang Hui, a spokesperson for the bereaved families, said Malaysia Airlines left them with no choice but to go to court to seek answers.翻译:遇难者家属发言人江辉举着“恢复搜寻”和“重新成立国际调查组”的牌子，表示马航让他们别无选择，只能上法庭寻求答案。

"'We are not responsible anymore' is their attitude," said Jiang, whose mother was on board.翻译:“‘我们不再负责’是他们的态度，”蒋的母亲在船上。

There was a heavy police presence outside Chaoyang District People's Court in Beijing before the hearing, with reporters cordoned off and unable to interact with the family members.翻译:开庭前，北京朝阳区人民法院外戒备森严，记者被封锁，无法与家属互动。

Some of the relatives, who spoke to reporters after the hearing, said they wanted the resumption of search efforts and for Malaysia Airlines to directly communicate with them as well as to provide them with psychological counselling.翻译:一些在听证会后接受记者采访的亲属表示，他们希望恢复搜寻工作，并希望马航能够直接与他们沟通，并为他们提供心理咨询。

Many said these demands were more important than the monetary compensation.翻译:许多人表示，这些要求比金钱补偿更重要。

"My mother died last year and she brought up my son. Until the very end I hid from her what really happened to him," said Beijing resident Bao Lanfang, 71, who lost her son and daughter-in-law on board. She said her husband had recently died after suffering from severe depression because of the incident.翻译:“我的母亲去年去世了，她抚养了我的儿子。直到最后我才向她隐瞒了他的真实情况，”71岁的北京居民鲍兰芳说，她在船上失去了儿子和儿媳。她说，她的丈夫因这起事件而患上严重抑郁症，最近去世了。

In March, another group of relatives urged the Malaysian government to allow U.S. seabed exploration firm Ocean Infinity to mount a new search for the missing plane.翻译:今年三月，另一群亲属敦促马来西亚政府允许美国海底勘探公司 Ocean Infinity 对失踪飞机进行新的搜索。

Reporting by Laurie Chen; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:陈劳瑞报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑
